channel.title: MTP V3 - With Full Screen Client - Best Pking Server!
channel.description:
[b]If any staff members have a problem with this, they should PM me and remove this thread. If you just remove this thread, I will keep posting it.[/b]
Well this is like my third time re-posting because staff keep removing this for some reason. MTP V2 was very successful getting thousands of downloads.
The goal of MTP is for players to be able to join and start pking within minutes. MTP V3 takes the pking experience to a whole new level with a full screen client.
[b]THIS SHIT ISN'T DSPK. IT WAS CODED OFF THE ORIGINAL MTP WHICH WAS CODED OFF REGULAR PI[/b]
Features: Awsome combat (some of the best PI combat you will see) PKP Shop & Donator shop along with many shops for everyone. New items since v2 include korasi with spec and dragon defender & overloads with effect. Full Screen Client Many skills added! Lots more LINK TO V2 INCASE YOU WANNA SEE MORE FEATURES: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,457959.msg3351330.html#msg3351330
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/13yngpf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/34y69uo.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/732ebq.png[/img]
Downloads: Full Screen client: http://uppit.com/tgn4x407f7bc/Rune-MTP_full_screen.rar Server: http://uppit.com/pma1cj4dvn3r/Rune-MTP_SOURCE.rar Cache: http://uppit.com/objx3990gpts/runemtp.rar ^- The cache used to download directly off my site. When I get money to pay my hosting bill it will continue to, but for now you have to download it and place it in C:/users/runemtp (the cache's name should be runemtp after you extract it.)
Inb4renegetsmadbutimmadathimfortryingtoratme

@Adobe wrote:

[quote=“smiley9648, post:17, topic:400620”]Thank you but there is another problem…

The command like ::givemaul or ::infhp is not working when Iputted myself owner (3). What could i do?[/quote]

if (playerCommand.startsWith("commandhere") && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Adobe")) { —rest of the code after this, just change commandhere to your command.

OT: great release, hope too see more coming.
